text: Jack Edward Larson (February 8, 1928 - September 20, 2015) was an American actor, librettist, screenwriter and producer. He is best known for his role as Jimmy Olsen in the television series Adventures of Superman (1952-1958). He also appeared in Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman and Law & Order: Special Victims Unit and the movie Superman Returns (2006). He retired in 2011. Larson was born in Los Angeles, California. He grew up in Pasadena, California. He was of Swedish and Russian ancestry. He was gay and his partner of 35 years, director and screenwriter James Bridges, died in 1993. Larson died on September 20, 2015 in Brentwood, California, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American composers Category:American movie actors Category:American playwrights Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:LGBT people from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Actors from Pasadena, California Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Pasadena, California
title: Jack Larson
